sub_title: Business Development Professional | Renewables and LNG | Project Management PMP®
summary:
I am a critical thinker, business developer, and communicator. 

I honed my technical skills from my double MS Smart Cities and Communities and Energy Engineering in Europe (i.e. UK, Belgium, Spain) and business acumen from 4 years of project/business development roles in Philippines’ energy and real estate markets. My holistic personality and clear communication style enables me to lead project teams and increase company’s bottomline. Having worked in an international environment, in both private and public organisations, has enriched my views and collaborative approach to solve critical problems.

I am passionate in projects and innovative business models for renewable energy, storage, smart cities, energy communities to make energy transition a reality.

I’m looking for business development, project/portfolio management and sustainability consultancy roles related to energy, innovation and smart cities.
